snippet.title: 1/24/13 in :60 Seconds
snippet.description: France intervenes in the Mali Conflict, Hillary Clinton testifies about Benghazi, and blogger Tavi Gevinson plans to read poetry.

snippet.title: France & The Mali Conflict - Edward Berenson
snippet.description: Professor Edward Berenson discusses the colonial history of France, narcoterrorism in Mali, and the nature of French military force.

snippet.title: France & The Mali Conflict
snippet.description: Anti-gay protestors flood Paris, while French President Francoise Hollande pursues Al Qaeda in Mali with sophisticated helicopter gunship.

snippet.title: January 24, 2013 - Tavi Gevinson
snippet.description: France & The Mali Conflict, Edward Berenson, Benghazi Attack Hearing, Tavi Gevinson, “Rookie Yearbook One,” Stephen's Makeover

snippet.title: Halal in the Family - Iran & Egypt
snippet.description: John Oliver takes advantage of a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to repair America's relationship with the Muslim world.

snippet.title: February 14, 2013 - Susan Rice
snippet.description: Organisation of Islamic Cooperation Meeting in Cairo, John Oliver & Ekmeleddin Ihsanoglu, Susan Rice
